messages.no_permission: You are not allowed to do that!
messages.no_owner_specified: Please specify an owner ID! (e.g. 1234512345123, Nobody)
messages.key_not_found: That key doesn't appear to exist!
messages.key_not_specified: You have not specified a license key!

messages.give_user_id_not_mention: Please provide the user ID. Do not mention them.
